content: this pattern is to make a coraline squid ornament this is a written pattern with no photo tutorials you will need -hobby lobby s i love this cotton in turquoise -3 5 mm crochet hook e -large pink button -sewing needle -scissors and stitch marker -poly-fil abbreviations -magic_ring magic_ring -single_crochet single_crochet -increase increase -decrease decrease if you need help with this pattern feel free to email me at morbidlymade@gmail com or message me through ravelry
